name: Futurama
overview: Futurama The Game is the first videogame of Futurama. Versions are available for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox, both of which use cell-shading technology. A version for the Nintendo GameCube was planned, but later canceled due to a belief that the show's popularity was too limited. A Game Boy Advance version was also planned, but it was cancelled as well. Released: August 13, 2003
